title: Oklahoma firefighter clown, woman charged in child porn case
text:
Ex-Oklahoma firefighter who dressed as clown for kid-safety program busted in child pornography case Okla. firefighter clown busted in child porn case NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  41 PM 
A former Oklahoma firefighter — known for dressing up as a clown to teach children about safety — and a woman have both been charged in a child pornography case that spanned to Arkansas. 
Zack Perry, 30, an ex-member of the Muskogee Fire Department's clown society, and Melissa Skelton, 36, of Stillwell, have both been charged with conspiracy and child sexual abuse. He allegedly traveled to Arkansas to pick up a 6-year-old girl between November 2015 and December 2016 to have sex with her, officers allege in court documents, the Tulsa World reported. 
Skelton knew the girl and allowed her to spend the night with Perry at his home last May. Investigators also allege that Skelton provided Perry with pornographic photos of her and the child in exchange for money, an affidavit states. 
Perry has also been charged with human trafficking, aggravated possession of child pornography, child sexual exploitation, and crimes against nature. 
FBI apparently authorized to run 23 child porn sites: docs Muskogee police arrested former firefighter Zachary Perry, 30, on charges of possession and distribution of child pornography. 
He was arrested earlier in January after a mother called Muskogee police saying he allegedly asked her to send him naked photos of her 8-year-old daughter, according to News6 . He resigned from the fire department on Jan. 11. 
Muskogee Officer Lincoln Anderson said at a press conference that there may be more victims involved. He added that investigators are searching through Perry’s electronics for additional evidence. 
Perry’s cellphone allegedly contained “1,378 images and videos relating or depicting child pornography,” according to court documents obtained by the Tulsa World . Muskogee police arrested Muskogee firefighter Zachary Perry, 30, for possession and distribution of child pornography. (NBC4i) 
“Additionally, there were photos, videos and texts discovered that the suspect Zack Perry had been involved in or facilitated the recordings of sexual acts between an adult female and a dog,” the affidavit states. 
Those images led to the arrest of Skelton on Feb. 3. She and Perry are being held at Muskogee County Jail and are scheduled for a Feb. 21 court appearance. Join the Conversation:
